reviews.author: Ginger Walters
reviews.review: This is the perfect place for us to rent. The apartment is spacious and lots of light. Great location for walking around, going to the coffee shop, grocery store within walking distance. We love Fairhaven. Lots of delicious restaurants very

ownerResponse.text: Thankyou!  We believe the location is the best as well, next to Bellingham Bay, walking trails, yet adjacent to Fairhaven!

reviews.author: Lucia Hough
reviews.review: The apartments are okay. Great location, but the construction just isn't there. I was in a unit above the gym for about a year and was woken up after 11 PM and at 5:30 AM due to the sounds of the treadmill below me. It was completely nerve

reviews.author: Rita Caufield
reviews.review: I have been helping a friend start the apartment search in Bellingham since her lease is up at the end of August and she would be willing to sign a lease for June or July because she understands the market. We actually both work in property

reviews.author: Brian Gass
reviews.review: Property maagement is easy to work with and very responsive. Great building and close to everything in Fairhaven! Units are well built.

reviews.author: Stacie Pratschner
reviews.review: We're so happy to be living at Fairhaven Harbor!  Beautiful apartments, the best neighborhood, and great management and staff.

ownerResponse.text: Thanks for your comments.  We are very fortunate to have a great management team!  Thanks for the nice comments!

reviews.author: Heather F
reviews.review: Beautiful apartments, excellent amenities, and a great management team. Highly recommend renting here!!

reviews.author: mark aarstol
reviews.review: A beautiful new building snuggled across from the bay in fairhaven.

reviews.author: Bill Duffy
reviews.review: Better then most gas stations for price in the area.
